title.native: アイドリッシュセブン Third BEAT! 第2クール

description: The second cour of the third season of IDOLiSH7.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

node.description:
__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayase_0404) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayase_0404/) | [NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/86488427) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/Ayase_0404) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvpredjG93ifbCP1Y77JyFA)__

Ayase is a Japanese composer, lyricist, arranger and member of the music duo [YOASOBI](https://anilist.co/staff/194287/YOASOBI).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayase_0404) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayase_0404/) | [NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/86488427) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/Ayase_0404) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvpredjG93ifbCP1Y77JyFA)__

Ayase is a Japanese composer, lyricist, arranger and member of the music duo [YOASOBI](https://anilist.co/staff/194287/YOASOBI).

[Website](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/masakierica/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masakierica)

Erika Masaki is a Japanese singer and lyricist affiliated with the Lantis label.

A collaboration for the *IDOLiSH7* franchise, containing 7 voice actors - [Atsushi Abe](https://anilist.co/staff/95991), [Takuya Eguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/102695), [KENN](https://anilist.co/staff/95857), [Toshiki Masuda](https://anilist.co/staff/107017), [Kenshou Ono](https://anilist.co/staff/95819), [Yuusuke Shirai](https://anilist.co/staff/114641), and [Tsubasa Yonaga](https://anilist.co/staff/95556).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.

**Doujin Circle:** Meguro Teikoku (目黒帝国, with [Meguro](https://anilist.co/staff/150816/Meguro)), Strawberry Lunch (with [Ai Minase](https://anilist.co/staff/100342/Ai-Minase))

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/arinacchi) | [Website](http://tanemuraarina.com/)

Arina Tanemura likes Japanese pop music very much (especially [Maaya Sakamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/95090/Maaya-Sakamoto), Aya Matsuura and the all-girl, [Morning Musume](https://anilist.co/staff/150336/Morning-Musume)) and she loves the game series Final Fantasy. She has one elder and one younger sister and one brother. She hates to lose (in every point of view) and she loves the Margaret Magazine of Shueisha. She says that she is too fat and that she dislikes her face. She has two cats named Riku and Kai, and at Tanemura's homepage you can find many photos of them. She wants to draw like no-one else (she can't lose...) and she loves to go to karaoke with her assistants (friends). She is good friends with the manga-ka [Ryo Maekawa](https://anilist.co/staff/98904/Ryo-Maekawa) and [Ruka Kazuki](https://anilist.co/staff/100291/Ruka-Kazuki).

She's not really a fan of yaoi (boys' love) manga, but she has made a yaoi doujinshi (no specified title) for one of her friends. She has also made a few adults-only comics on Full Moon wo Sagashite and Kamikaze Kaitou Jeanne.

Her nicknames include the sobriquets "Arinacchi" and "Arinaccho" (Arinaccho is a humorous play on Arinacchi, and was said just because of the ridiculousness of it all).

Arina participated in Shinshi Doumei Cross drama CDs as [Yoshitaka Ichinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/3507/Yoshitaka-Ichinomiya) and Postman.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ei_aoki)

Ei Aoki is a Japanese storyboard artist and director. He credits the anime Megazone 23 as his inspiration to have a career in animation. In 2013, he created the animation studio Troyca with Toshiyuki Nagano and Tomonobu Kato, which began animation production on its first work in the fall of 2014.

__Real name:__ Asuka Kato (加藤あすか)

[Website](http://www.spacecraft.co.jp/yuuki_aira/)

A J pop singer attached to the company Lantis. She began her career in 2007 performing in [Yuki Kajura](https://anilist.co/staff/100077)'s [FictionJunction](https://anilist.co/staff/103691) as "FictionJunction ASUKA". She released her debut album- Reflection on July 2, 2008.

Non-anime roles:
Hom-kun in "Atelier Meruru" (VG) (Japanese)
Theme Song Performance (OP/ED) for "Root Double -Before Crime * After Days-" (Visual novel) (Japanese)

ŹOOĻ is a 4-person unit consisting of [Haruka Isumi](https://anilist.co/character/158597/) as their center, [Touma Inumaru](https://anilist.co/character/158599/) as their leader, [Minami Natsume](https://anilist.co/character/158601/), and [Torao Midou](https://anilist.co/character/158600/).

They are handled by Tsukumo Productions with [Ryou Tsukumo](https://anilist.co/character/226465/) being their manager.
